beta-feature-minerva: Enable mobile skin ({{int:skinname-minerva}}) oan the desktap
beta-feature-minerva-description: Mak the skin uised on mobile devices ae selectable desktop skin unner the "{{int:prefs-rendering}}" preferances tab.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing: Bi hainin chynges, ye agree tae release yer contreebution unner the $1 license.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing-with-te: Bi hainin chynges, ye agree til the $1 n agree tae release yer contreebution unner the $2 license.
mobile-frontend-editor-new-page-confirm: {{GENDER:$1|Ar ye sair ye want tae cræft}} ae new page oan {{SITENAME}}?
mobile-frontend-editor-success-new-page: Congratulâtions oan cræftin ae new page!
mobile-frontend-editor-switch-confirm: Ye maun hain yer eedit afore switchin til anither eeditin mode.
mobile-frontend-photo-licensing: Bi uplaidin this eemage, ye agree tae release yer eemage unner the $1 license.
mobile-frontend-photo-licensing-with-ter: Bi uplaidin this eemage, ye agree til the $1 n agree tae release yer eemage unner the $2 license.
mobile-frontend-profile-footer-ancient: Makit [[Special:Contributions/$1|{{PLURAL:$3|1 eedit|$3 eedits}}]] n [[Special:Uploads/$1|{{PLURAL:$4|1 uplaid|$4 uplaids|500=500+ uplaids}}]].
mobile-frontend-requires-mobile: This page isna available oan desktap. Please clap the mobile luik-at airtin at the bottom o the page.
